meanings.definition: In a manner involving the offering of something as a sacrifice.
meanings.sent1: She placed the flowers sacrificially on the altar.
meanings.sent2: The villagers gathered sacrificially to honor their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The cat sacrificially offered its toy mouse to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The student sacrificially gave up his lunch money to help a friend.
meanings.sent5: The hero sacrificially jumped in front of the bullet to save the president.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves giving up something for the benefit of others.
meanings.sent1: He sacrificially donated his time to help the homeless.
meanings.sent2: The team worked sacrificially to achieve victory.
meanings.sent3: The clown sacrificially gave up his red nose to make a child smile.
meanings.sent4: The sun sacrificially sets to give way to the moon's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The tree sacrificially shed its leaves to nourish the soil.
